name: Egg's Dream
description:
The world was shattered into many pieces. Only a mythical beast, yet unborn, may save it. Your goal is to carefully carry the egg through this fractured world, to save the beast and thus save the world.

The game was created for Ludum Dare 46 (Theme: "Keep it alive") by Raphnika and Apace. It was created using the Unity game engine. The foot step sound and the tree falling sound are external assets, everything else was created by us. We also used the free Unity asset LeanTween for a few things, available in the Unity asset store.

Controls:

  • WASD (or Arrow Keys) to move
  • Mouse movement to look around
  • Space to jump
  • Hold left shift to sprint
